title: Apple Advertising Platforms - Campaign Execution Manager
summary: At Apple, we work every day to create products that enrich people’s lives. Our Advertising Platforms group makes it possible for people around the world to easily access informative and imaginative content on their devices while helping publishers and developers promote and monetize their work.
description: Management experience in creating teams that can effectively scale to meet business demands. Oversee and support the end-to-end process for digital campaigns which includes content review, campaign, asset trafficking and QA. Manage a team of specialists and delegate work to meet business demands. Collaborate with both Business, Sales and Operation teams to help, optimize and streamline workflows to increase team efficiencies and elevate service to clients and advertisers. Assist with collecting performance reporting to ensure accurate delivery of outlined campaigns. Think both quantitatively and qualitatively to evaluate campaign ad creative. Identify and report issues, patterns, and trends on the platform. Ability to quickly learn and use various internal tools to review and moderate content on the platform. Communicate and collaborate effectively with global stakeholders and cross-functional teams. Develop innovative solutions to maximize content moderation efforts. Lead and mentor a diverse team for success.
key_qualifications: Management experience within an Operations or Account Management team within an Advertising organization. Ability to build and mentor a team to meet business demands. Detailed comprehension and experience in trafficking display and other interactive formats. Experience with an advertising ad server and OMS system(FreeWheel, Operative, GAM etc.). Firm understanding of the advertising marketplace, vendors, and third-party technologies. Detailed oriented and the ability to prioritize tasks in a dynamic marketplace and work environment. Solid experience of delivering insights and optimizations based on reporting. Strong verbal, writing communication, organization and time management skills required. Familiarity with Apple products and services, especially MacOS, iOS. Incredible attention to details and ability to navigate ambiguity effectively.
education_experience: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree 5+ years of management experience, building and leading successful teams.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $164,200 and $285,900, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits.
